title: Woman Mage
description: A woman who wields magical powers derived from supernatural or occult sources. May also be referred to as a witch, enchantress, or sorceress.
apple_vendor_description: The woman-mage emoji on Apple devices features a graceful figure adorned in flowing robes, radiating a subtle glow of magical energy with soft, ethereal highlights. Her expression is one of serene wisdom and power, conveyed through Apple's signature rounded features and nuanced facial details. This emoji, with its rich, deep colors and sophisticated 3D shading, symbolizes enchantment, knowledge, and the mystical arts, adding a touch of wonder to digital communication on Apple devices.
